name: Survive the Night (videk)
description:
Venture out into the dark of night, scrounge for resources, and face the terrors that await you. 

A survival-horror game with a focus on light and resource management.

HEADPHONES STRONGLY RECOMMENDED. Mouse and keyboard controls.

A prototype made in just over a week. One level to explore, one enemy type, three torch types to choose from and a fourth unlockable torch.

This will likely be expanded into a roguelike with randomly generated levels, multiple enemy types, more world objects to interact with, and more varied objectives.

Any/all feedback is very appreciated!

0.002 Update:

- Minor UI improvements

- Better control descriptions

- Fixed bugs when starting a new game

- Enemies will always play unique audio when aggravated

Art assets from Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/assets)

Lighting engine by Jobo (https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/7820/lighting-system-2d)

Audio from Freesound (https://freesound.org/)
